entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over western sections overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
